name: acro bat
description:
navigate deeper and deeper into a dangerous cavern as a small lil bat !!!

made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48 !!!

CONTROLS
  • W to jump
  • AD to move
  • hold W mid-air to glide
  • let go of W while gliding to perform a mid-air jump
  • W while against a wall to do a wall jump (replenishing the glide)
DISCLAIMER

not the best at making levels :p

might be slightly too hard
